ProjectsData.title: ligevan

ProjectsData.title: BrainBox
ProjectsData.description: Developed a scalable e-learning platform supporting paid courses, instructor dashboards, AI chatbot support, real-time chat, and admin management.

ProjectsData.title: Paxu
ProjectsData.description: Developed PAXU, a personal finance app for spending management, loan capacity calculation, fee estimation, and living cost comparison. Built backend with NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, Parse Server and led major migrations (Parse 2.8→8.2.1, MongoDB v4→v6) while collaborating with a remote team.

ProjectsData.title: TheSync
ProjectsData.description: Application to Support Group Formation and Capstone Thesis Development for Information Technology Students at FPT University
